alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Jones; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:54PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Thunderstorms and gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, west central Hyde, east central Onslow, southeastern Beaufort, Carteret and Pamlico Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1152 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Terra Ceia to Bogue. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. Strong southerly winds ahead of these storms will gust in excess of 50 mph at times. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Harkers Island, Stella, Swansboro, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Straits, Marshallberg, Smyrna, Merrimon, Pine Knoll Shores, Harlowe, Lowland, Florence, Broad Creek and Janeiro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Jones; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
